title: Never got the free mystery skin from the ocean week?
body: I remember getting my free champion, but I don't remember seeing a popup saying that I got a new free skin, maybe I didn't have enough points or something?

replies.body:
Hey there,

You only received a Mystery Skin if you had <10 available champions to purchase, otherwise you received a mystery champion.

All the rewards and an event recap can be found [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-events/oceania-victorious).
Thanks, just realised there was no free skin
